svt_non_abstract_report_object Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_non_abstract_report_object:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Used to get around the fact that ovm_report_object is an abstract virtual object in OVM 2.1.1/2.1.1_1.
